Service Details: - Designed for youth under 18 years of age who are in care with the Ministry of Children and Family Development, and who are transitioning from group home care- Assists youth to develop life management skills necessary for successful transition to adulthood- The family care homes provide support, mentoring and skill enhancement for one youth, who are provided a separate living space to start experiencing greater independence while receiving ongoing support and interactions with the family in the home, with a foster parent in the home and available to the youth at all times during their stayProgram facilitator:  - provides support to both the foster parents and the youth- provides youth with support for life management and day activities- provides the foster parents with 24 hour/day emergency support, consultation, crisis intervention, debriefing, mediation and training
How to Apply: Please contact the office for additional details
